descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the text; unable to identify the main idea or supporting details.
Struggles to understand the text; identifies the main idea with significant inaccuracies and provides little to no supporting details.
Shows limited understanding of the text; identifies the main idea with some inaccuracies and provides few supporting details.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of the text; identifies the main idea accurately and provides some relevant supporting details.
Shows a strong understanding of the text; identifies the main idea accurately and provides relevant supporting details.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the text; identifies the main idea accurately and provides thorough, insightful supporting details, demonstrating a deep comprehension of the material.
Unable to engage with the text due to its complexity.
Requires significant scaffolding to understand basic elements of the text.
Needs some scaffolding to navigate the text, but demonstrates limited independence.
Engages with the text with minimal scaffolding; demonstrates an ability to understand the text with some support.
Independently navigates the text and demonstrates a solid understanding of its complexities.
Independently and proficiently comprehends the text's complexities; able to analyze and interpret sophisticated elements of the text.
Does not demonstrate any ability to apply knowledge gained from the text.
Struggles to relate information from the text to other contexts or ideas.
Attempts to connect information from the text, but connections are superficial or inaccurate.
Relates information from the text to other contexts with some accuracy and relevance.
Demonstrates a strong ability to apply knowledge from the text to other contexts and ideas with clear connections.
Synthesizes information from the text and applies it to other contexts, generating new insights and demonstrating sophisticated understanding.
